ValidationRule.description: Sales team should only ‌be able to make the following status/substatus transitions: Draft → Submitted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Claim_Stage__c), NOT( AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Claim_Stage__c)) == 'Draft', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) == 'Submitted' ) ), OR( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'CACS'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'CARS'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'USRS') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not permitted to move the Case to this stage.
